Title: multiSearchFirstIndexCaseInsensitiveUTF8
Description: Returns the index i (starting from 1) of the leftmost found needlei in the string haystack and 0 otherwise. Assumes haystack and needle are UTF-8 encoded strings. Ignores case.
haystack — UTF-8 string in which the search is performed. String.needle — Array of UTF-8 substrings to be searched. Array.
index (starting from 1) of the leftmost found needle. Otherwise 0, if there was no match. UInt8.
